title: Problemas con imágenes de facebook en Firefox
content: Buenas, he tenido el problema que en facebook con el navegador Mozila Firefox no me carga las imágenes o videos, foto de perfil; tengo que refrescarla varias veces para que las cargue.
creator: jramirezc28

title: Firefox downloads
content: Firefox updates use the term MSI, but never do you explain what that means. Come on guys step around the counter and act like a user. Not only what does it mean, but what are the differences between MSI and the download without MSI?
creator: rhdesktop

content:

title: My Firefox suddenly frozen on Linux many times.
content:
When I'm using my Firefox for too long or few couple of minutes its suddenly fronzen and stops response. So I need to restart it, killing the process using top,htop or kill commands. It has been weeks that this problem started. I waited for updates and tried reinstall it, but no futher SO updates and reinstall solved the problem, if the new Firefox release updates could put a end to this problem.

I have here some ID number of my bug report that I send to Mozilla, if someone could help understand if its a package/driver or miss configuration I would like to know.

bp-8764ac27-aa1c-4db5-831c-ae2460211031 bp-87b0281c-aae3-418e-8f45-828f20211031 bp-d01fcb65-6123-499a-a3d8-4c7950211031 bp-83d56e36-0d58-4456-a7e5-677370211031 bp-a385f497-2271-4120-bdbb-474440211031 bp-f320a744-5606-4743-87ab-763620211031 bp-4a2d704e-cf83-4eb5-8df0-c10b70211031

When press the upper right button 'x' to close, it says that my Firefox isn't respond due to: 'Firefox: Exiting due to channel error'

I don't know how to fix it or find better logs messages to discover what is happens on the Firefox. I have SO with Windows 10 and I don't have this problem at all.
creator: Albertojr11

title: I have lost years of bookmarks, passwords and alike
content:
Hello,

Late yesterday afternoon we experienced some sort of electrical glitch.

It was only a millisecond, and my computer went off and then rebooted.

This left me with all of my emails, attachments, contacts ect... gone from Mozilla Thunderbird.

The great news is with the assistance of their forum, we were able to get all of the emails, attachments, contacts ect back online.

However, during the process of trying to get Mozilla Thunderbird I unistalled and re-installed Thunderbird.

This also took with this all of the bookmarks, settings and passwords that Firefox Browser had. Over 5 years worth.

At the moment I am devastated.

Can we get all of this back.

Can someone help please.

Thanks in advance!

Mr Gee
creator: gerard.willett
